deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 51 mins
features: SAMBUCUS ELDERBERRY EXTRACT WITH ZINC AND VITAMIN C – Viva Naturals Elderberry supplement for adults combines the strength of five high quality immune supporting ingredients.* We have included a high potency of Vitamins C and D for immune support.*
POWER OF ZINC AND GINGER – Along with black elderberry extract, Ginger also helps in providing antioxidant-like support and Zinc oxide (an essential nutrient) helps to maintain immune function.*

GET YOUR DAILY INTAKE OF VITAMIN C and D3 – Your new go-to elderberry and zinc supplement is packed with Vitamin C – an essential vitamin and daily immune system support,* with 400 mg of Vitamin C in every serving. You also get more than a full serving of Vitamin D3 with 5000 IU.

MORE ELDERBERRY PER SERVING (1000 mg) – Elderberries have been traditionally used for antioxidant-like support.* Our 5-in-1 Elderberry Vitamins capsules are packed with 1000 mg of super-concentrated elderberry extract per serving, equivalent to 4000 mg of fresh fruit.

2 MONTH SUPPLY OF POWERFUL IMMUNE SUPPORT* – While other brands’ elderberry supplements will only last 30 days, Viva Naturals Elderberry immune support supplement* brings you exceptional value with a 2-month supply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comprehensive Immune Support: Viva Naturals Sambucus Elderberry Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently began taking Viva Naturals Sambucus Elderberry with Zinc, Vitamin C, Vitamin D3 5000 IU, and Ginger for Adults, and I am extremely pleased with its effectiveness in supporting my immune system. This comprehensive and potent blend of essential nutrients and natural ingredients has become a key component of my daily wellness routine.Viva Naturals combines the immune-boosting power of elderberry, Vitamin C, and zinc with the added benefits of Vitamin D3 and ginger, creating a well-rounded and synergistic formula. Since taking this supplement, I have experienced increased energy levels, improved overall well-being, and fewer instances of seasonal colds.The easy-to-swallow capsules make it convenient to incorporate this powerful supplement into my daily routine. I also appreciate that the product is made from high-quality ingredients and is free from GMOs, gluten, and artificial additives.Adding Vitamin D3 5000 IU to the formula is an excellent touch, as it not only supports immune function but also contributes to bone and muscle health. The inclusion of ginger provides further benefits, such as improved digestion and reduced inflammation.In conclusion, Viva Naturals Sambucus Elderberry with Zinc and Vitamin C for Adults has been a fantastic addition to my wellness regimen. Its potent blend of immune-boosting ingredients and comprehensive health benefits make it an excellent choice for anyone looking to strengthen their immune system and maintain optimal health. Highly recommended!
